Html:
Hi,

I'm waiting caching cell to solve issue about memory (big files).

So can you tell me the date of this future version?

Many thanks

Carlos

At the moment, we are not willing to commit to any date when this feature will be available. We have made significant improvements in the PHPExcel memory footprint over the last few releases, and will continue to try and cut down on the memory demands over the next few. Cell caching is just one mechanism that we are looking at to reduce that footprint.
